record.field: #Government

Operational capabilities are an attribute for viewing controls from the perspective of the information security capabilities professional. Attribute values ​​consist of Governance, Asset_Management, Information_Protection, Human_Resource_Security, Physical_Security, System_and_Network_Security, Application_Security, Secure_Configuration, Identity_and_Access_Management, Threat_and_Vulnerability_Management, Continuity, Supplier_Relationship_Security, Legal_and_Compliance, Event_Management information_security and information_security_guarantee.
